content.body: I think we have categorized that set of issues as out-of-scope, but I guess it's worth pointing out somewhere once it's no longer a draft.

content.body: I think a possible change for JS is to allow more BIDI markers where they might not be allowed today. Maybe they are already allowed in those places in HTML.
